Human Insights for
Digital Relationships

Catalyze healthy remote culture by tracking your and your team's emotional well-being in Slack.

Start Trial

You Work Hard. You Work In Slack. You Work Remotely.

Conveying emotions over virtual communication is very hard. Aside from flat out admitting that you’re having a bad day, there’s no other way to get the job done.

Internal facilitates this awkward part of talking about how you and your coworkers are feeling so that you’ll never have to question whether or not you’re getting on someone’s nerves or they just slept poorly.

You know emotions are important. They're just hard to gauge virtually.

Internal lives within the app you use everyday to get work done and provides you with emotional insights to the entirety of your virtual team.

Know exactly how different divisions are feeling without having to observe their interactions.

Benefits

The culture improvements experienced thanks to Internal

Cohesion

Champion the development of tight coworker bonds and relationships.

Productivity

Get more done by knowing when it's best to approach your teammates.

Communication

Open communication channels so that no teammate feels left behind.

Start your 2 week trial and add Internal to your Slack, no credit card necessary!

About Us

An emotional communication tool for the remote team

Internal lets you know how your remote coworkers are feeling everyday so you know when it’s best to approach them, and them you. It provides a means of gaining insights to virtual team dynamics so that you don't need to monitor Slack channels to gauge sentiment.

Frequently Asked Questions

If you don't find an answer here, be sure to contact us - we're happy to help!

  • What is emotional health?

    Emotional health is a measure of how well you are doing within your own head.

  • How can you measure emotions?

    We give you a single, emotion-related topic, like fulfillment, and give you 4 options to choose that describe how fulfilled you are. We can't quantify emotions themselves, but we can show how severely you are feeling a certain thing.

  • How do I cancel my subscription?

    Send us an email and we'll cancel your subscription within 12 hours. support@getinternal.co

  • Do you collect my data?

    We do, indeed, collect the necessary data to compute scores and things of that nature. For more information, feel free to take a glace at our Privacy Policy for a detailed account of data collection. Privacy Policy

  • Can anyone see what answers I choose?

    Nope! Only you have the ability to see what options you chose on your personal reports.

  • What are the insights Internal provides?

    Internal packages up your own or a team's aggregate responses to daily check ups and sends the results in an easily consumable Slack message on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis.

Internal helps people be more empathetic. We help teams build a culture of transparency and acceptance.
